doctor.name: Dr. Md. Imran Hossain
doctor.degree: BDS (DU), PhD (Dental Surgery) France, MSS (Clinical) DU, MPH (USA), PGT (Orthodontic)
doctor.specialty: Dental Implant, Invisalign, Dental Braces, Smile Design, TM Joint Disorder, Tooth Whitening, Perfect Root Canal, Cancer Operation, Tooth Whitening, Dental Jewelry, Cleft Lip & Palate Surgery Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Imran Hossain is a one of the best Dentist in Dhaka. His qualification is BDS (DU), PhD (Dental Surgery) France, MSS (Clinical) DU, MPH (USA), PGT (Orthodontic), Research Fellow & Surgeon (STRC Project, Smile Train, USA), Advanced Implantology (Thailand), Invisalign (Thailand & India), Advance Training in Fixed Orthodontic Braces, Implantology & Laser Dentistry (India). He is a Chief Consultant, Dental Surgery at Dental View Orthodontics & Implant Center. He is an expert in Dental Implant, Invisalign, Dental Braces, Smile Design, Oral Surgery and Tooth Whitening. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Dental View Orthodontics & Implant Center from 10am to 9.30pm.

chamber.address: House No # 67/C, Road # 11, Block # E, Banani, Dhaka-1213

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. B.A.K Azad
doctor.specialty: Root Canal Treatment, Orthodontic Braces, Aesthetic Filling,Painless Scaling, Dental Implant & Crown Bridge
doctor.workplace: Former Head of Orthodontics Department, Dhaka Dental College, DhakaEx-Principal- Dhaka Dental College, DhakaEx-Director- DG Health, Mohakhali, DhakaResident Dental Sugeron (Ex)University College Hospital, London, UKFocal Point (Dentistry)World Health Organization, South East Asia RegionPresident-Bangladesh Dental Research Foundation
doctor.info: Prof.Dr B.A.K Azad is one of the most renowned Dentist in Bangladesh. He passed Bachelor of Dental surgery (BDS) from Dhaka Dental College in 1984. Then he took Diploma in Dental Surgery (DDS) from the University of Dhaka in 1988. After that Dr. Azad completed his MCPS from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons. Then in 1998, he took his MDS (Master in Dental Surgery) in prosthetic dentistry from the University of London. He is also a fellow of International college of Ptosthodontists (FICP), America. In Bangladesh Dr. Azad started his professional career by joining Bangladesh Civil Service Health Cadre in 1985. After serving in the different levels he became a professor & head of Orhtodontics of Dhaka Dental College and hospital. Dr. Azad also served as a postgraduate trainee in Eastman Dental Hospital, London, UK. He also served as a Principal of Dhaka Dental College, the only government owned Dental College in Bangladesh and also served as a Director, (Dental) at Directorate General of Health Services (DGHS), Ministry of health and family welfare. Now he is serving as a Focal Point (Consultant) in World Health Organization (WHO).

doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Quazi Billur Rahman is a renowned dental, oral, and maxillofacial surgeon in Dhaka, holding degrees and credentials including MD (Stomatology), PGD (OMFS), PhD (OMFS), along with advanced training in oral and maxillofacial cancer and reconstructive surgery from India and Germany, and implant dentistry with CBCT from Canada. He serves as a Professor of Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. Dr. Rahman specializes in the diagnosis and surgical management of oral cancer, jaw tumors, facial trauma, temporomandibular joint (TMJ) disorders, cleft lip and palate, dental implants, and complex oral infections. Patients can consult him at Health and Hope Hospital, located at 152/2/G, Green Road, Panthapath, Dhaka – 1205, from 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.info: Dr. Subrata Kumar Barai graduated from City Dental College in 2003. He completed one year Post Graduation Training on Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery from BSMMU. During his professional service he achieved advanced training on Dental Surgery and Dental Implant Prosthesis from CMC Vellore, India. He is specialist in dealing with different oral and dental diseases, artificial replacement of missing teeth such as crown, bridge, implant & maxillofacial prosthesis and also expert in high tech endodontic procedures like root canal treatment & endodontic surgery. He joins Square Hospital as a highly skilled Oral & Dental Surgeon.

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Kazi Hasinur Rahman
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Kazi Hasinur Rahman is working as a consultant in General Dentistry in this hospital from February, 2009. He completed his BDS (Bachelor of Dental Surgery) from Dhaka Dental College in 1994 and MS in Prosthodontics from BSMMU. He is trained in Implant Prosthesis from his home country & abroad. He has worked in a good number of reputed institutions for the last 20 years. He has also been in the teaching profession for the last 18 years and working as a professor currently. As a Prosthodontist, his special expertise is in artificial replacement of missing teeth such as Crown, Bridge, Implant & Maxillofacial Prosthesis. He is also expert in high tech endodontic procedures such as Root Canal Treatment & Endo-Surgery.

doctor.name: Dr. Sanzida Khan
doctor.degree: BDS, PGT (Conservative Dentistry & Endodontics), PGT (Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery)
doctor.specialty: Oral Surgery, Root canal, Conservative, Orthodontics, Pediatric Dentistry
doctor.info: Dr. Sanzida Khan is a highly skilled Dental Consultant & Surgeon specializing in Oral Surgery, Root Canal Treatment, Conservative Dentistry, Orthodontics, and Pediatric Dentistry. She holds a BDS degree and has completed PGT in both Conservative Dentistry & Endodontics and Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery. Additionally, she has received specialized training in Aesthetic Dentistry and Orthodontics, ensuring comprehensive dental care for patients of all ages. Dr. Sanzida provides expert treatment for various dental issues, including tooth decay, gum disease, misaligned teeth, and complex oral surgical procedures. She practices at Sporsho Dental Care, located on the 1st Floor of Ramzannesa Super Market (Metro Rail Pillar 165) in Mirpur 12, Dhaka. Patients can visit her from 4 PM to 9 PM, except on Fridays.

chamber.address: 1st Floor, Ramzannesa Super Market (Metro Rail Pillar 165), Mirpur 12, Dhaka

doctor.name: Dr. Subodh Chandra Chakraborty
doctor.specialty: Orthodontics (Braces, Bite Problem, Jaw Problem) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Subodh Chandra Chakraborty is a skilled orthodontics (braces, bite problem, jaw problem) specialist and surgeon in Dhaka, holding qualifications including BDS and FCPS (Orthodontics). He serves as an Associate Professor of Orthodontics at Saphena Women’s Dental College. Dr. Chakraborty is experienced in treating conditions such as dental malocclusion, crooked teeth, jaw misalignment, overbite, underbite, and temporomandibular joint (TMJ) issues, along with providing advanced orthodontic care including fixed and removable braces for both children and adults. He is available for consultation at Dentotal Dental Centre, Banani, located at House # 54, Road # 11, Block # F, Banani, Dhaka, from 5pm to 9pm every Tuesday.

chamber.address: House # 54, Road # 11, Block # F, Banani, Dhaka
